wikipedia_page.main: John Timothy Curzon (born 4 June 1954 in Lenton, Nottingham) is an English former first-class cricketer active 1978 who played for Nottinghamshire.

response: *Sir John Curzon, 1st Baronet (c. 1599–1686), MP for Derbyshire
